item.title: Rhizomatic notetaking
item.description: The past few weeks I’ve been exploring the philosophy of Deleuze & Guattari in which I focus mostly on the rhizome. As the rhizome doesn’t have a start or end, grows from within itself and into multiple directions I saw similarities on how I started to take more notes recently.
